name: Guipple
description:
Quickly swing through the air using your grappling hook, kill enemies on the way and gain the highest score!

You will have to react quickly, grapple from one block to another, approach the enemy, and finally strike them down!

Made for the Score jam 17

------------------CONTROLS------------------

WASD - movement
SPACE - jump
RMB - grappling hook
ESC - main menu

------------------TEAM------------------

Me - code

Kir - audio design

Helicopter - models
